title: Explain New Feature from Release Notes
description: A customer calls asking for more details about a new feature they saw mentioned in the latest release notes.

tasks.description: Ask the customer which new feature they are interested in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the feature in question.

tasks.description: Access the internal documentation and training materials for that new feature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the internal guide for the feature.

tasks.description: Explain the purpose, benefits, and basic usage of the new feature to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer understands the new feature and how it can help them.
